replies.message: Know what else is disgusting? Your homophobia. It's actually making me a little nauseous.
stop
You're disgusting. These people have the right to love who they chose, just as you do and if you feel they should have this right, then maybe you shouldn't either.
STUPID !!
God made Adam and Eve. Not Adam and Steve.
Ade, you know what they say about homophobic people.
Your face is disgusting.
I know, right? Equality is soooo sick!

How bout you keep it to yourself Aqib.
If you want to keep your rights, I suggest you let others have theirs.
Aqib you're a dick! And you are disgusting! Your Ignorance makes me sick.
Homosexuality is found in over 450 animal species. Homophobia in only one. You are unnatural.
its not disgusting  its just different stfu its not your life, haven't you heard of looking the other way and ignoring it?!
It really is disgusting..Gosh, I wana throw up!..eeeeeeeeeew

you know what i find disgusting, that in america where everyone is spose to be able to live equally dispite HOW a person wants to live yet your religion is one of the few that cant go with that. you dont like it, then get of the LGBT page simple as that.

How about this...Isn't this whole thing about "FREEDOM"? Why does he not have to option to voice his opinion just like Pro-Gay marriage supporters? If we're really going to be a land of the free, it can't just be a one sided street. Stop being hypocrites.
disgusting like u couse u lokk like a monkey fkerrrr
Its not being homophobic... Lol. Its speaking his opinion.
homosexuality is a mental illness that people support and say its normal.

So I guess, since you hate gay people, you are secretly one of them, but you deny it and pray to your God to restrain you from those sinful thoughts, right? This is usually how it works. Please, try not to reproduce yourself. We try to move forward ;) Oh, and btw, I respect your opinion because it's a free world. I just don't agree with it.

Tara Storm, it is homophobic. If I saw a black guy and said disgusting despite the fact that there was nothing disgusting about him, would you say I'm stating an opinion or being racist? If you don't know, the answer is racist. Just like Aqib is being homophobic.
lol aquib ur just tasking the piss you love them really

Mattias Eriksson I'm going to need you to read a current psychiatric journal. It's stopped being a mental illness back in 1975. Take it from someone who suffered 3 years of straight counseling and electroshock therapy. It's not anything I could change.
I think you are afraid to show the world what you really are!! JUST SAYING!!!
Aqib is not being homophobic. He is following the bible.
